name: Dreamy Escape VR - Fragment 5
description:
Dreamy Escape VR - Fragment 5 is a short game in Virtual Reality playing with the concept of change blindness. What was there last time you looked may not bit there anymore the second time you check for it.

It's better experienced as a seated experience. You will need a bit of space though.

The goal was more to provide a dreamy feeling than an escape game per se. The 3 "puzzles" are a bit like 90's point and click, don't look for too much logic in them. ;)

Expected Playtime: 5 - 10mn

It's the last of multiple fragments exploring simple and short concepts in virtual reality.

My goal was to be able to release game-jam-like (maximum 2-3 days of development) short experiments for a few weeks. This one took around 15 hours to make.

I hope you will enjoy it!

You can find other fragments here!

---------------------------------

Credits:

3D assets: What Remains of Edith Finch free assets
Key Prop:  https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/old-key-3ds/448201
Music: Nebular Focus - Dan Henig
VFX: Particles and Wind Control System
SFX: Imphenzi Universal Sound FX
